ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] PvP Servers
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep...it sure is easy to build up trust.  Just make friends, just like you would elsewhere.  Pkers generally don t try to make friends and hang out w/ you.
ygData.messageBody:
Yep...it sure is easy to build up trust. Just make friends, just like you
would elsewhere. Pkers generally don't try to make friends and hang out w/
you. They just rush up when you're weak or obviously much lower level than
you.

They can't get anything in bags.

They can take things you are wearing, but it's only 1 random item..so if
you don't want to lose something cool, bag it b4 u die.

Guards will protect you if you're right next to them, but don't attack.
Let them hit you, and the guard will step in. However, they won't do
anything about you getting casted on or shot w/ a bow from a distance.




"IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield" <persona@...> on 04/03/2001 03:25:35
PM

Please respond to EverQuest@yahoogroups.com

To: "'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'" <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
cc:
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] PvP Servers


Can you be PKed near guards?

So the idea is to somehow work up and grab No drop weapons?

Can they take items from bags?

Can they take items that you are wearing?

Is it possible to build up trust in this type of game?
